group.name: Happiness and Performance at Work (Belgium and beyond)

description:
After a brief welcome word, Raph Glassberg will introduce us with the Happy Members who want to share and discuss a case.

Our Happy Speakers on this 1st edition are:

- Michel Tubbax, Managing Director Belgium, StepStone

- Toon Cuypers, Sales Manager, AVE Productions

Happy Members who want to share a case, will receive a 10 minute time slot for their presentation. This will be followed by a session of Q&A of maximum 10 minutes (+ the remaining of the first 10 minutes, so that you won't loose any of those).

After the presentations, we might decide to hold additional activities with the whole group or in smaller groups.

If we have some time left, we will be able to connect with the other people present and to get to know each other.

Presentation cases can be:
1) A successful business case of something that you have applied at your own company (or, in case of a consultant, at your client's company) and which can be beneficial for other companies or organizations.

2) An issue that you are facing right now within your organization, concerning which you would like to ask for advice from the audience

If you are a consultant, we would encourage you to have a representative of your client make the presentation, eventually together with you.

Presentations are not meant to be sales pitches.
The idea of these meetings is to share experience with the rest of the audience. Therefor, we would like to invite you to come with an energy of abundance.

If you are interested in presenting a case, please contact me via [masked] or [masked]

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cWlb5tEiCVo&feature=youtu.be
name: 1st Free Workshop on Happiness and Performance at Work

group.name: Happiness and Performance at Work (Belgium and beyond)

description:
Session 2 will be held on 20/3, the world happiness day :-)

It is a session you will definitely want to attend.

Anita Sheehan, myself and a few more inspiring actors in the field of organizational performance and happiness will provide you with a reliable and proven approach that will enable you to lastingly transform your organizations into more positive, productive and human environments.

You will learn and experience for yourself how you can inspire your organization towards More Engagement and Better Results.

And the best about this, is that this workshop is free of charge for you. The only thing you need to do is register, as long as we have seats available.

May we also kindly ask you to register as soon as possible so that we can make sure that we have enough of everything for everyone who will be joining us.

Like always, you will have the opportunity to connect with others. So put on your best smile :-)

One final remark: if you will be late, you are welcome to join. Yet, we would recommend you to be there by 19:00 and strongly recommend that you would be there before 19:30 so that you receive the basics for the assignments of the evening.

We are still checking options for sandwiches, which would be provided between 18:30 and 19:00.

If you would like to help us organize this or following sessions, or if you would like to propose some help or materials (food and beverages, stationery, filming, welcoming people, speaking, ...), please let us know.
Again, we are doing this for free, out of passion. The more we are to contribute, the better for everyone.
name: Making Your Workplace Happier and Better Performing

group.name: Happiness and Performance at Work (Belgium and beyond)

description:
What keeps people coming back to the companies they like dealing with most?

It's rarely just the price, nor is it always the product or service itself...

What keeps them coming back is how they feel about those companies.

And,  that feeling comes  from ‘human’ interaction and the quality of every personal contact – from call centre to receptionist to sales people to account managers, all the way to the top.

Join Helen Kerrison and Eric de Vries as they share game changing techniques and values-based research that change the way people think about themselves, their business and the interactions that are central to ‘happiness & performance’ in business.
name: Session 3: creating happy workplaces

group.name: Happiness and Performance at Work (Belgium and beyond)

description: During this group workshop, together we will explore what each happy member has experienced to be working, in terms of happiness & performance at work.
name: Discovering what works
